header.title: Our Services
header.subtitle: Comprehensive healthcare coordination and travel support for international patients

intro.title: Our Services
intro.desc: MedEminence provides structured coordination and logistical support for international patients seeking treatment in India. Our focus is on facilitating access to accredited hospitals and licensed medical professionals while managing non-medical aspects of your healthcare journey.

caseReview.title: Medical Case Review Coordination
caseReview.desc: We assist patients in securely sharing medical reports and treatment requirements with appropriate hospitals and licensed specialists for review.

hospitalMatching.title: Hospital & Specialist Identification
hospitalMatching.desc: Based on the patient's medical needs, we coordinate with accredited hospitals and qualified medical professionals.

costEstimation.title: Travel Planning Support
costEstimation.desc: Assistance with flight planning, airport transfers, and local transportation related to treatment travel.

visa.title: Accommodation Coordination
visa.desc: Support in arranging accommodation near hospitals for patients and accompanying family members.

travel.title: Local Assistance During Stay
travel.desc: On-ground coordination including hospital navigation assistance and logistical support.

care.title: Post-Treatment Follow-Up Coordination
care.desc: Assistance with sharing medical reports and coordinating follow-up consultations after discharge.

language.title: Language Support (Subject to Availability)
language.desc: Language assistance may be arranged upon request, depending on location and availability.

followUp.title: Service Fees Information
followUp.desc: MedEminence charges a separate service fee for non-medical coordination and support. This fee covers logistical and travel-related assistance only and does not include medical treatment costs.

local.title: Medical Costs Clarification
local.desc: All medical treatment costs are paid directly to the hospital by you and are determined solely by the healthcare provider.

process.title: How MedEminence Works
process.desc: Our structured coordination process focuses on facilitating access to healthcare while maintaining clear separation from clinical decision-making.

one.title: Medical Information Submission
one.desc: Patients securely share medical reports and treatment requirements through our enquiry form.

two.title: Case Review Coordination
two.desc: Medical details are shared with appropriate partner hospitals and specialists for evaluation.

three.title: Treatment Pathway & Travel Support
three.desc: We assist with treatment planning logistics, travel coordination, and accommodation near hospitals.

four.title: Care Coordination & Follow-Up Support
four.desc: On-ground assistance during treatment and coordination of post-treatment follow-up communication.

cta.title: Ready for Coordinated Healthcare Access?
cta.desc: Share your medical information for structured coordination with accredited hospitals and licensed medical professionals in India.

whyServices.title: Our Coordination Commitment
points: Focus on logistical and travel assistance

items.q: What is included in the service fee?
items.a: The service fee covers non-medical coordination and logistical support only. Medical treatment costs are separate and paid directly to hospitals.

items.q: How are hospitals and specialists selected?
items.a: We coordinate with hospitals and specialists that meet recognized accreditation, regulatory, and professional standards.
All clinical decisions, treatment plans, and medical outcomes are determined exclusively by licensed healthcare providers.

items.q: What role does MedEminence play during treatment?
items.a: We act as a non-clinical intermediary, providing coordination and logistical support while medical care is delivered by healthcare providers.
All patient information is handled confidentially and disclosed only to authorized healthcare providers for care coordination purposes.
